title: wine_Il_Paradiso_di_Manfredi_2007_Riserva__(Brunello_di_Montalcino)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 15191.
country: Italy.
description: Aromas of ripe, dark-skinned berry, baking spice sunbaked soil, tobacco, grilled herb and a whiff of leather unfold on this smooth, structured red. The juicy, polished palate doles out fleshy wild cherry, crushed raspberry, cinnamon, candied orange zest, iron and nutmeg framed in velvety tannins that impart a silky mouthfeel. It's already delicious but will continue to develop complexity over the next decade. Drink through 2027..
designation: Riserva.
points: 95.

province: Tuscany.
